snippet.title: Shin Megami Tensei: Imagine! - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Before you jump  into any of the new F2P MMOs, check out "Shin Megami Tensei: Imagine!"  a massively-multiplayer online (MMO) title based on the Shin Megami Tensei universe.  Players' success relies on them forming an alliance with demons or slaying them.

Platforms: Mac, PC
Rating: T
Genre: Persistent Online RPG 
Publisher/Co-Publisher: Atlus / Aeria Games & Entertainment
Developer: Cave

Get ready to slay demons at IGN with more info:
http://pc.ign.com/objects/837/837855.html

Subscribe to IGN's channel for reviews, guides, trailers and all things gaming: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=ignentertainment
